controller

Class MainScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MainScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MainScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    . MainScreenController. This class controls the main inventory screen containing lists of parts and products. It also broadcasts modification of components to Products or Parts controllers.
